content.text1: We recognize all people as unique individuals made in the image of God. Compassion requires a willingness to join people in their suffering and journey with them. As we pursue relationships with people who are vulnerable, we experience mutual transformation.

content.header1: We work for justice in our neighbourhoods and around the world.
content.text1: We passionately care for people and want to ensure our actions don't cause more harm than good.  That's why education is our top priority. We stop to learn about the issues facing those around us and strive to make informed decisions before taking action. We walk with vulnerable people, relying on their experience and understanding of  their environments, and provide support when we are invited.  We expect the journey to change us as we engage in changing the world for the better.
